mapper.select: SELECT T.T_NO , T.T_GYM_NAME , T.T_GYM_ADDRESS , T.T_AREA , T.T_METRO , T.T_AREA_INTRO , T.T_ONE_INTRO , T.T_PRICE , T.WEEKDAY_SC , T.WEEKAND_SC , T.T_INTRO , T.QUE_INTRO , COUNT(R.REVIEW_NO) AS SUM_REVIEW , ROUND((SUM(R.STAR)) / COUNT(R.REVIEW_NO), 1) AS AVG_STAR , M.USER_NO , M.USER_NAME , M.USER_PHONE FROM TRAINER T JOIN MEMBER M ON(T.T_NO = M.USER_NO) JOIN PT_ORDER O ON(T.T_NO = O.T_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN REVIEW R ON(O.PAY_NO = R.PAY_NO) GROUP BY T.T_NO , T.T_GYM_NAME , T.T_GYM_ADDRESS , T.T_AREA , T.T_METRO , T.T_AREA_INTRO , T.T_ONE_INTRO , T.T_PRICE , T.WEEKDAY_SC , T.WEEKAND_SC , T.T_INTRO , T.QUE_INTRO , M.USER_NO , M.USER_NAME , M.USER_PHONE

SELECT T.T_NO , T.T_GYM_NAME , T.T_GYM_ADDRESS , T.T_AREA , T.T_METRO , T.T_AREA_INTRO , T.T_ONE_INTRO , T.T_PRICE , T.WEEKDAY_SC , T.WEEKAND_SC , T.T_INTRO , T.QUE_INTRO , M.USER_NO , M.USER_NAME , M.USER_PHONE , COUNT(R.REVIEW_NO) AS SUM_REVIEW , ROUND((SUM(R.STAR)) / COUNT(R.REVIEW_NO), 1) AS AVG_STAR FROM TRAINER T JOIN MEMBER M ON(T.T_NO = M.USER_NO) JOIN PT_ORDER O ON(T.T_NO = O.T_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN REVIEW R ON(O.PAY_NO = R.PAY_NO) GROUP BY T.T_NO , T.T_GYM_NAME , T.T_GYM_ADDRESS , T.T_AREA , T.T_METRO , T.T_AREA_INTRO , T.T_ONE_INTRO , T.T_PRICE , T.WEEKDAY_SC , T.WEEKAND_SC , T.T_INTRO , T.QUE_INTRO , M.USER_NO , M.USER_NAME , M.USER_PHONE HAVING T.T_NO = #{tNo}
SELECT P.PT_NO , P.PT_DATE , P.USER_ID , P.T_NO , T.T_PRICE , T.T_AREA_INTRO , M.USER_NAME , M.USER_PHONE FROM PT_ORDER P JOIN TRAINER T ON(P.T_NO = T.T_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(T.T_NO = M.USER_NO)

SELECT R.REVIEW_NO , R.STAR , R.R_CONTENT , R.R_DATE , R.MODIFY_DATE , M.USER_NO , M.USER_NAME FROM REVIEW R JOIN PT_ORDER O ON(R.PAY_NO = O.PAY_NO) JOIN TRAINER T ON(O.T_NO = T.T_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(R.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE T.T_NO = #{tNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE CATEGORY='PT'
